data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Derka, Tomáš, Fedor, Peter (2010): Hydrolutos breweri sp. n., a new aquatic Lutosini species (Orthoptera: Anostostomatidae) from Churí-tepui (Chimantá Massif, Venezuela). Zootaxa 2653: 51-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276205
